mapper.insert: CREATE TABLE `view_type_item` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `sections_index` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `img_url` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, `img_url_webp` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, `img_url_color` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, `w` int(11) unsigned zerofill DEFAULT NULL, `h` int(11) unsigned zerofill DEFAULT NULL, `ad_position_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `material_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `view_type` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, `stat` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, `line_color` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, `line_height` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, `title_logo_url` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_bin DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=0 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin;

insert into view_type_item (id, sections_index, img_url, img_url_webp, img_url_color, w, h, ad_position_id, material_id, view_type, stat,line_color,line_height,title_logo_url) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sections_index,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{img_url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{img_url_webp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{img_url_color,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{w,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{h,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ad_position_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{material_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{view_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{line_color,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{line_height,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{title_logo_url,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

id,
